website_summaries.verdict: Wallet-friendly option for a lightweight, slimline folio case. Looks high-end and professional.
pros: Folding outer flap also functions as a kickstand
Magnetic cover works with sleep/wake function
Speakers and ports are accessible via well-placed and well-cut holes
Protection is superior to other folio designs
cons: Only compatible with iPad 5 Mini 2019 models and newer
Corners can be more delicate than expected

customer_reviews.title: I’m quite surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I recently received a Mini iPad #5, and needed a sturdy case. My first choice was a green leather case; however, when I went to purchase, alas it was sold with a potential of no further units to come. So I found what appeared to be a sufficiently protective, inexpensive case to carry me forward. It arrived, fit perfectly, even the cut outs were perfectly placed! I am truly surprised. The first case is now back in stock, but I won’t get it, as I have an incredible case at a third of the cost! Buy this case, you will be pleasantly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: G V Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Wow $7.99 wife says as good as the apple case we paid $60 for on her previous mini. Perfect fit and alignment of all openings.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd ramsden

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Apple Case
customer_reviews.text: I've used multiple JETech covers and they area great alternative to the more expensive Apple case. This cover is a fraction of the price and is no different than Apple's. It is very grippy, all cutouts are precise, and the inside of the cover has a nice soft texture, the body is a bit better protected than Apple's magnetic case with very minimal change in size and weight. It is a little bit of a fingerprint magnet, but just a damp cloth on outside cleans them right up. Maybe the magnets to keep it in the stand mode could be a touch stronger, but that's only trying to find something wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cederbaum

customer_reviews.title: Case fits iPad mini perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover better than the one I bought through Apple--easier button/switch access. And I love the color. It seems like a sturdy cover, but it is not as heavy as the covers I've bought for Kindle Fires, so I don't yet know about durability. I do wish the cover flap was not the tri-fold. I much prefer the single fold of the Kindle cover--it is steadier in both vertical and horizontal propping. Overall it this is a nice cover, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blanks aka StFlossie

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but extremely week magnets
customer_reviews.text: This fits the ipad mini 5 perfectly. However, the magnet that holds the case closed is extremely weak. The folio case I had for my mini 4 made a distinct snapping noise when closing and took a little effort to open. This one I worry may just open by being jostled in my backpack. If you so much as brush your hand against the lip of the case while closed it will open. So, nice in your hands for usage but garbage for protecting it while closed.
customer_reviews.author: Waltor

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Item was severely damaged. Corners, button side were deformed/ broken and the inside edge of the top was rubbed trough to the metal. The ware through the inner fabric liner did not come from a one time accident, because I could see multiple rub lines. There was no styrofoam piece in the case. Beside the damage the item looked overall a little bit flimsy. Got my money back immediately and bought another one but from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Not durable; brittle plastic.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of regular use (mostly in bed reading books and setting on the bedside table), the corners of the case crack and break. The plastic is very brittle for some reason (I haven't been exposing it to sun or chemicals, or what not). I actually bought a second one of these thinking the first one was a fluke but a month later the same thing happened. Switched to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zanegin

customer_reviews.title: Corners have issues
customer_reviews.text: Corners chipped and cracked after about two weeks of light use.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Mini
customer_reviews.text: After my iPad mini slid off my car seat and hit the ground, I knew I needed a protective cover. The JETech Case filled the bill with a perfect fit and low price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Had this case for IPad mini 3. Was glad to find out they had it for my iPad mini 5. Is very good product all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for my new 5th generation iPad. Fits great and on/off function works. Better than my old magnetic Apple cover - this provides full coverage of the back as well and at a fraction of the price of Apple cover. Slim and sleek - still fits inside my old Encase sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had been shopping for a cover but we were going on travel and running out of time so I thought I’ll just get something inexpensive to get me through the trip and continue shopping when we get back. It shipped and arrived fast and I was really surprised with how great it looked and performed. For me one of the best features of the iPad mini was that you could hold it in one hand. You don’t lose that with this cover, you just fold it behind the iPad and you can still grab and hold the whole tablet with one hand. Now I have no need to continue shopping.
customer_reviews.author: StaurosAgape

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a cover for my ipad mini. It seemed that the mini was supposed to "click" into the molded plastic bottom. The corners were not square and no matter how hard I tried it would not click in- when three sides were in the fourth would pop out. I had to get my old cover out of the garbage. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A,. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Unfinished Plastic Edges
customer_reviews.text: Poorly design case, bottom that holds iPad mini 5 is made of cheap plastic with unfinished edges. Edges really hurts if iPad falls on you while reading. Returned this case. I would highly recommend ESR Yippee Trifold Smart Case which is by far the best. Buy ESR case instead this case.
customer_reviews.author: Cubbies

customer_reviews.title: Great case that suits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My mini is used primarily for my drone but in between, I'd like to use it more generally and just wanted something very cheap that was easy to slip on and off and could be used as a stand. This fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BG Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, fits well, seems like it will provide good protection Came at a price I couldn't believe. I have not always had good luck shopping the choice/ratings category. But this time it was definitely the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Taro L. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I had a JETech case for my previous tablet and knew as soon as I purchased my iPad that I wanted the same case for it. I'm very happy with it. Easy to hold, good quality--especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pandam0m

customer_reviews.title: Works well for price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, sleep mode works well, button access very good. I have another leather-like from another mfgr that is nicer, costs more but almost can’t find the buttons. Durability is untested but it is lighter. Better than bare case but is light and easy to handle. Seems like a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I needed a protective cover for my iPad Mini 5. Fits perfectly. Slim design so it slides easily into pocketbook.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple dupe
customer_reviews.text: Apple sells these exact cases for $40 lol. Save yourself a little cash and get this one instead. It's sleek, light, and well made - I expect it to last for a longgg time. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice but took me a while to discover a place for a pencil. I thought first the cut on the bottom is for it. The cut is too short so I came to this page to complain about it. A very clever place for the pencil its on the back inside the folded case. It has magnets to hold it better. So I'm giving all 5
customer_reviews.author: Jula

customer_reviews.title: Attrctie and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This one was for my wife. I've had one for several years, and although a little scuffed, it looks and works just fine. Like the back surface: easy to hold, and you can put a sticker on it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Stack

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: A cheaper version of the Apple product, but works just as well. Used an Apple brand cover on first iPad for at least 4 years - this one works just as well. Prefer this style as it closes the iPad when you use cover instead of having to use the side button. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: The right stuff
customer_reviews.text: You need a cover to protect the device, to make it easy to hold, to prop it up at the right angle, to not cost more than it should. This is absolutely the right stuff. It works perfectly, as you would expect it to. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly at a wonderful value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this inexpensive case based on the positive reviews and it works great. iPad fits in snugly and stays firmly in place. Sleep and wakeup work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Larry218

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I won my 5th gen iPad mini through a work christmas raffle (yay me!) and wanted to protect it right away. I ordered this case protector and it fits great and keeps my iPad safe. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: JE Tech
customer_reviews.text: The case is smooth, and feels nice to the touch. It fits perfectly. I'm very happy that JE Tech stands behind its product. My cover had problems with the manufacturing of the case, and JE Tech took care of it. Now I'm a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: tvaddict24-7

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and they were good the price was fantastic so I was skeptical at first but it is a great product!!! Will tell my friend who is looking for one too
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for mini iPad, esp for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fits well on mini iPad. It’s easy to open and close and the magnet works as expected. The material does look like it will get scratched but that seems to be how most of these covers are. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: aisha

customer_reviews.title: Does not come w stylus, but fits fine
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know why shows with stylus. Does not come w stylus. Just a basic cover. Fits well. Light weight. Will do for non travel, home use.
customer_reviews.author: P. mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: Great quality low price
customer_reviews.text: Light, protective and thin. Works very well. The name brand is the same, but will set you back $30 or more.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great thin covers
customer_reviews.text: I did return this because I found something different that I liked better. These are however awesome and had one once before for a larger iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Nana698

customer_reviews.title: excellent value ipad cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Protects well but very lightweight. Very good value for the price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Corsones

customer_reviews.title: “Smart cover” is not so smart
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good case. My main issue is the “smart cover” doesn’t always work. I’ve opened my ipad to find it very hot and still on after leaving it with the smart cover on for hours in my bag
customer_reviews.author: Hector coronado

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mini iPad case.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Mini gen5 like a glove. Nice feel, not slippery. Sleep mode works great. All in all a very nice case, and comes in a variety of colours.
customer_reviews.author: rick parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got these cases from this seller in the past, I like them. Their very thin but protective, but I must mention it does get fingerprints on it that are hard to remove!
customer_reviews.author: Toni M.

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I’ve purchased three different colors. They are durable. I don’t really use the trifold life for a stand. It doesn’t hold well
customer_reviews.author: Leola C. Sammons

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The magnet to close the screen does not work properly, it has a very low power. I had a hard time getting it folded to keep the iPad standing, and then it sometimes fells. Magnet is too poor. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Fio

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and durability. Protects my iPad very well. I just noticed that the picture had a stylus. I didn’t receive one.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann chopey

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPad mini 5th generation perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fit iPad mini 5 perfectly. Was exactly what I wanted.... light, East sleep mode, cover bend for positioning.... good color selection.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, durable, and light weight. Doesn't even feel like there is a case on it but it provides good protection too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gilberto

customer_reviews.title: cheap purchase, cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iPad mini case less than 4 months ago and it has broken in sooooo many places that it's ridiculous. i barely even use my iPad or the case to even warrant the current wear and tear. I'd actually like a replacement...for free!
customer_reviews.author: Vincentia Egonmwan

customer_reviews.title: The Best By Far!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect case for a small price! It is far better than many of the other cases I’ve purchased in the past. The description provided says it all. Don’t miss this one!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that this actually fits my iPad mini. Arrived on time, item is what’s described. The only this is that it’s hard to hold because of the cover, otherwise it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Applegirl17

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Apple Mini iPad 5
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Apple Mini iPad perfectly. Maintains its slim profile while offering some protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coating flakes off :(
customer_reviews.text: I liked this case a lot until after only 4 months of use the coating on the back of the case started flaking off
customer_reviews.author: ljn

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: This product is far better than the Apple version. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but odd ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: This case fits very well, no wiggle room or Anything else weird. The sleep mode works quite well. My huge issue with the case is actually holding it. The folding front cover, when folded over the back, is about 1/4 inch longer and 1/8 inch taller than the iPad itself. I understand why it may be made this way, but it makes holding the iPad very awkward and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew korczyk

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to hold open, stand doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Love the pink color but stand doesn’t work and inside cover is annoyingly felt which feels awkward when holding. I can’t get the stand to work in either direction.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon K.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This sleek cover makes my new iPad 5 mini so easy to hold. Pop your iPad into the holder and you’re ready to go. Close the cover and the iPad goes into sleep mode. Reasonable price and so much lighter than the ones sold at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect case for the 5th Gen iPad Mini. Fit and finish are perfect. I only wished they made more colors. Hint hint wink wink!
customer_reviews.author: Aamer K.

customer_reviews.title: Corner is broken
customer_reviews.text: New iPad mini, Hasn’t been dropped, the corner of the cover has a chip broken off. No idea if it came that way or broke off since purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Daggett

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but could use some changes
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good case, though I would recommend a few tweaks to make it better. I wish the top part of the case covered more of my iPad like the bottom part does. See pictures. I also wish it covered the speakers. See pictures. The part left uncovered is vulnerable to scratches and dents. But as of right now, I am enjoying the case.
customer_reviews.author: Munro McLaren

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good case
customer_reviews.text: Couple years ago I ordered a case from this brand for my mini ipad. It worked so well up to today. My husband just bought a new mini ipad for himself. So I came back and ordered this case for his. Completely happy with it. The price of the new one is about half price of my old one. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: XXX

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking and hoping for. Professional, sleek design. Terrific price and efficient/secure delivery. Smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: StageStar

customer_reviews.title: Good covers
customer_reviews.text: Have had several Jetech covers over the years. Prefer their design over others.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Clayborn

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Why spend 3 times for a case that function the same, it will do the same job
customer_reviews.author: Bing Yiu

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color and well made
customer_reviews.text: My favorite color is red and this is a vibrant gorgeous red. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Lady S.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to hold the iPad without it slipping out of my hand.
customer_reviews.text: It was just the cover I wanted and the many color choices was nice too. The fit was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: M Z

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and simple
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several electronic device covers from JETech. All are lightweight, simple, functional and very reasonably priced. This cover fits the iPad mini5 perfectly, without covering the buttons. I bought a separate elastic adhesive pouch sleeve to attach to the cover, whenever I need to carry the pencil with me.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cover got the pink n it’s the same color as the picture so girly! Feels like good quality
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This one is perfect! The buttons are all accessible and it is light
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 6 months..
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and snug. Shuts off when closed as it should. Liked it until the corners became brittle & started to chip off after only six months.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Overall it fits well BUT...
customer_reviews.text: case fits perfect on the iPad but the cover does not rest perfectly with the sides of the case so it stabs your hand a bit making it uncomfortable to hold. if you are using the case to prop it up and set it down its perfect but if youre planning on holding it for long periods of time it is very uncomfortable. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Pinero

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but good protection for my iPad mini. I probably buy it in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Book reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit❤️
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. The color is beautiful, seems durable and fit my mini iPad 5 perfectly. The price was also good😄
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This fits iPad mini 5 perfectly. I like the sleek yet sturdy build and sleep function. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: A great, inexpensive protective case for Apple IPAD Mini!
customer_reviews.text: The automatic sleep/wake feature is a battery saver and makes this case a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case and it does everything it should as a case.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and is what I expected. Worth the small price
customer_reviews.author: tennismj

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ro

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not super sturdy wish I had spent a bit more for better quality
customer_reviews.author: rvela

customer_reviews.title: No stylus received
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with no stylus. This was a gift for my mother and I’m very upset about that.
customer_reviews.author: Katia Francisque

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It's such a pretty pink! The holes line up perfectly and the screen cover part is soft on the inside and works well!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome inexpensive case!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! Love it so far - exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: ashleyangle

customer_reviews.title: I have protection for my mini I-Pad
customer_reviews.text: I used it to cover my Mini-Pad. For the money I thought it was okay. It fit really well, the back part was sturdy and the cover maybe not has tough or durable. Just got it a couple of days ago so still checking it out.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Pink iPad mini cover.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I like the color and the protection it give my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Phylliss C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I like the matte feel, it makes it easier to hold. The pink is such a cute soft color. Rated durability a 4 for now because I’ve only owned it a week or so so I’m unsure how it holds up over time. So far it’s on par with expectations.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. Doubtful it will protect. Does not adhere to the actual iPad itself. Please do not waste your time and money on this product
customer_reviews.author: Dan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder because this was not the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Much too brittle.
customer_reviews.text: A good case, snap-fit, but have the JB weld ready for breaks. Mine has snapped twice in the same area.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A great cover and protective device for the iPad Mini. Fits extremely well. Much easier to carry around with the case on. Minimal additional weight. Overall, am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall the case works but it would be nice if it was made a little better. It would also be nice if it had more standing options.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: If you want an alternative from the actual apple case, this is a really good one. I’ve had it for a couple weeks now and its like new. I would totally recommend this if you are looking for a cheap (in price) case for your ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Jordy Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stand up very well. IPad falls flat at least little nudge. I’m sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The case works fine except that it started falling apart after 6 or so months of usage. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: max lee

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one for a mini 5 and one for a pro 12.9. Both used about the same, no drops out hard activity. The case for the mini 5 started cracking and breaking in 25 days. Buy month 2, I had to throw it away. The case for the pro 12.9 is still fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: The Wife Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The wife "LOVES" it. Very comfortable to use. I would do it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T.

customer_reviews.title: JUNKTech
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic corner broke off after a few months of gentle use. SEE ATTACHED PHOTO
customer_reviews.author: Milena Bezjak

customer_reviews.title: Corners broke, fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Corners broke as well after a couple weeks of use. Good fit but bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put it one it!
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect on my iPad thank you! Is so easy to put it on it.
customer_reviews.author: Villajusin

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice case but sometimes it doesn’t stand up like it’s supposed to and it gets finger prints all on the back. However for the price it’s not bad
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it feels. Very soft. Very durable and fits tight. I got the rose gold to match my mini iPad that is rose gold. Matches perfectly. Love it!!! Penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works the same way that the Apple model does and for a lot cheaper. It looks great and does what it should; protects the iPad and acts as a stand. I had an Apple case before and it broke, so from now on I will buy this company's products and save money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chips and Cracks after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and feel of the product - sleek and protective. However, with minimal wear and tear over the past 6 months the case has started to break and chip on 3 of the 4 corners. It still gets the job done currently, however I’m concerned about it’s long term ability to remain attached to the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The product can’t be easily removed if I chose to. It cracked the back cover already
customer_reviews.author: Nicolo Dominique Obfenda

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent case for the iPad Mini. It easily starts to chip away at the corners after a few weeks though. There are better cases out there. I suggest the ESR Rebound Slim Smart Case instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Auger

customer_reviews.title: Practical and  useful
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to hold. Perfect for protection and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Temporary case
customer_reviews.text: The case didn't last. If you want something that will temporarily take care of your iPad, this is for you. The sleep mode works fine. It is very light. It is a good size, but the case did break very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Little Flower

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, good quality, easy to hold, fit perfecly in the ipad and good price
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

product_meta.title: JETech Case for iPad Mini 5 (2019 Model 5th Generation), Smart Cover with Auto Sleep/Wake, Black
feature_bullets: Designed for iPad mini 5th Generation 2019 model. NOT compatible with iPad mini 1/2/3/4. Fit iPad Models: A2133/A2124/A2126. Please check back bottom of your iPad to find the model number
Made with PU+PC. Slim/light design. Synthetic exterior and smooth interior provide comprehensive protection for your iPad
Magnetic smart cover supports automatic sleep/wake function. The tri-fold front cover can support iPad in two standing position for viewing and typing
Easy access to all the controls and features; Perfect cutouts for speakers, camera and other ports
Package includes: iPad mini 5 (2019) case, customer service card

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,261 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
